#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    std::ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    long long int t,arr[10000],m,n,diff,sum;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        sum=0,diff=0;
        cin>>n>>m;
        int i;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            cin>>arr[i];
            sum+=arr[i];
        }
        sort(arr,arr+n);
        i=0;
        while(m--)
        {
            diff+=arr[i];
            i++;
        }
        diff=abs(2 * diff - sum);
        cout<<diff<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
